title: AquaLink RS — Control Panel: No Power

s1_low.text: Is VAC < 21 and fuse good? If yes → replace transformer. If VAC is low due to primary/line, correct primary voltage first.

check_fuse.text: Check continuity of the fuse (3/4" 3.15A). Fuse blown?

fuse_blown_path.text: Investigate why the fuse blew: check JVAs for shorts, verify valve moves smoothly, measure relay coil resistance (300–400Ω for 3 HP relay). Then replace fuse with correct rating.

replace_pcb_if_needed.text: If fuse keeps opening with everything removed (re-add low-voltage connectors one at a time), replace PCB.
